meanings.definition: Showing signs of being troubled or disturbed
meanings.sent1: The old, haunted house had broken windows and overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent2: The girl's haunted expression revealed her inner turmoil.
meanings.sent3: The haunted look on his face made his friends worry about him.
meanings.sent4: Her haunted past continued to affect her present decisions.
meanings.sent5: The haunted forest seemed to whisper secrets to those who dared to enter.

meanings.definition: Inhabited or frequented by ghosts or spirits
meanings.sent1: The haunted castle was said to be home to many restless spirits.
meanings.sent2: The haunted room in the inn gave guests an eerie feeling.
meanings.sent3: The haunted mansion was a popular spot for ghost hunters.
meanings.sent4: The haunted graveyard was avoided by the townspeople after dark.
meanings.sent5: The haunted ship creaked with ghostly echoes in the dead of night.

meanings.definition: To visit or inhabit frequently or habitually
meanings.sent1: She haunted the library every weekend, searching for new books.
meanings.sent2: The memories of his childhood home haunted him for years.
meanings.sent3: The smell of fresh bread always haunted her dreams.
meanings.sent4: The melody of the song haunted him long after it ended.
meanings.sent5: The ghost of regret haunted him wherever he went.
